# Feature Checklist

This a checklist that can be used to determine whether a feature document is well-formed.

If all items are ticked off, the document is well-formed.

If only some items are ticked off, the document may have issues that may need to be addressed.
Feed back to the user in these cases.

[ ] Document fits the provided template
[ ] Document is valid well-formed markdown
[ ] Document is stylistically consistent and plain English
[ ] All terms used in the document that are not considered 'plain English' are listed and explained in the Definition of Terms section in the document
[ ] All links in the document are valid
[ ] Document is able to be rendered legibly in text, in Markdown preview, and on GitHub
